courses.title: Introduction to Programming
courses.description: A beginner's course in programming using Python.

courses.title: Data Structures and Algorithms
courses.description: Learn about data structures like lists, stacks, and queues, and algorithms like sorting and searching.

courses.description: Master the fundamentals of React and build modern web applications with hooks and components.

courses.description: An introduction to machine learning concepts, including supervised and unsupervised learning.

courses.title: Game Development with Unity
courses.description: Learn how to create 2D and 3D games using the Unity engine and C# programming.

courses.title: Cybersecurity Fundamentals
courses.description: Understand key cybersecurity principles, including network security and encryption.

courses.title: UI/UX Design for Beginners
courses.description: Explore the fundamentals of user interface and user experience design with tools like Figma.
